Question
========

A person achieves a score of 12.7 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 11.5 with a standard deviation 2. The z-score of the person with 12.7 good is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -0.3
* 0.6
* 1.24

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.3: Incorrect
* 0.6: Correct
* 1.24: Incorrect
